caption: Highly recommend coming here. My friend and I went for drinks around 6pm, and the ambiance was great! Lively, but not too crowded which was nice. Their tequila cocktails are 10/10! Along with that, the staff is very friendly and give exceptional service. Definitely worth checking out, and coming back :)

Went here for our valentines date - the service and drinks were really good! Even gave out roses at the end. The food was okay for the price, but will be back for the ambiance and drinks in the future!
Great food & great service!

The drinks and food were really good, but some of the worst service I’ve had even pre-covid. Our reservation was for 130and ended at 330. They have a two hour bottomless deal. We got cups for water at 215, our first drink at 230(canceled the bottomless), and our food at 246. Second drink at  255. Felt like the waitress didn’t really care a wasn’t trying. Don’t recommend.

Had an incredible time last night for dinner. Brought some friends visiting from the suburbs here and they were blown away as well.  The service was on point. Our server Kelsy was friendly and very nice. Had a great upbeat attitude. Did great with our orders and made sure to check on dietary restrictions and allergies which we appreciated.  The food was unreal. Our chicken (the tenders and sandwich) were some of the best we've had anywhere in the country. Not kidding.  We shared a frito mac and cheese and we should have ordered 2 because it was gone in 3 seconds.  Our friend had the burger and she said it was just as good as anywhere in the city, small cheval and little bad wolf included.  Our drinks were strong and very flavorful. Our only complaint was we had to leave at 11 because of curfew (not uproars fault, city ordinance). We're making a reservation to come back next month!
Seriously suprised by the quality of this chicken sandwich... one of the best in chicago. Not a hot one tho. Fries will be decisive. Burgers were good too.
Great vibes, food and cocktails. What else can you ask for...this place will be an old town staple.

Felt overall underwhelmed by this spot. The ambience and service was good, but the menu is just incredibly plain. I found the chicken tenders were really heavy and salty. The chili mac with Fritos is a fun idea but relatively bland. Based upon the clientele, I suspect that the menu is geared towards those who do not like spicy food.

Horrible Covid safety. Their inside was packed with only a back door cracked open maybe 2 inches. Their tented outdoor area was so packed - each table was about 2 feet apart (not the appropriate 6 ft). Would not recommend if you take Covid safety seriously.  Otherwise, food was great! So would recommend post Covid in a year.
I was seated outside however it was as warm as it got in a outdoor tent at 30 degrees. Got mac and cheese and hot toddy. With such limited seating it was very great service in these trying times.

I love this place. So glad a place like this has opened in Old Town especially during Covid.  Vibe: It's a chill, intimate but modern bar with great drinks and great food. A handful of my friends and I dined outside in the tent. It was warm enough (if you sit away from the flap opening) with plenty of ventilation on a 25 degree night. They have blankets if you want them! No igloo petri dishes for me!  Safety: The staff was good about practicing social distancing and wearing face masks. I've seen some not so great places but felt confident about this place.  Food: Drinks were really good--especially the Old Fashion variations. Some of the group favorites were the fried chicken sandwich (LOVE IT), burger and the hush puppies. No frozen, overcooked patties and bag fries here!  Executive Chef Jamie Fischer (looked her up later) does a great job creating a simple menu that is full of depth.  The fried chicken sandwich was fried but then grilled for a nice char. I wished I was able to experience the full menu but understand they have to limit it based on the timeframe.  Service: Brittany did a great job handling our group and timing the service. She was super friendly, charismatic and accommodating to our group. I give her extra props because she wasn't just serving multiple parties and timing everything but running in and out in 20 degree weather.  Loved the experience overall and will continue to support so more local places like this stay in business! They have meal kits on a weekly basis and I can't wait to try it!
Big fan of this place.
Excellent atmosphere and very friendly staff. Will absolutely go back and highly recommend!
Excellent atmosphere and very friendly staff.  Will absolutely go back and highly recommend!
Every dish was so good! The pot roast is incredible!! I have eaten there several times and the consistency remains AAA+++, very important.  Can’t wait to try the family meal for Italian this week!

Top to bottom. From the time I entered with my daughter was an amazing experience. The BLT and the pot roast both amazing & I'll forever be in the shadows in my daughters eyes with the chicken nuggets. I've been here to watch games and with family just a great all around experience.

Uproar Chicago is second to none! Whether it's the food, the people, the drinks, or the atmosphere, Uproar checks all the boxes! Owned and Operated by the BEST in the BUSINESS! Come get some take-out (AMAZING), and get ready, because this place is just getting started!
It is not just a bar - has amazing food.
Great food and nice drink selection. Will go back soon

One of the best burgers I’ve had. Carry out food traveled extremely well and remained warm. The vibe of the bar is super unique and stands out amongst the rest of wells st. I’ll definitely be coming back!

Celebrated my birthday here and ordered almost everything on the menu with friends and family. Bartender made awesome drinks and shots, enjoyed excellent beets with lemon rind and pistachios, Dino nuggets with amazing dipping sauce, Caesar salad, killer fried chicken sandwich, burger, best fries ever, to-die-for pot roast and awesome service! Plus, hostess Brittany was the sweetest and partner Dante hooked us up! He was so incredibly nice, warm, welcoming, friendly and generous and he ensured a great time was had by all! Thanks for making my birthday special!

This place is incredible.  Went to Uproar with some friends for opening weekend and it did not disappoint!  Decor and ambiance were both awesome.  Drinks are excellent and there's a nice variety of craft cocktails.  The food was TOP NOTCH!  Short rib potroast was a hit!  Too many delicious options to list.  You cannot go wrong here.
(Translated by Google) Good service, good food  (Original) Buen servicio, buenas comida
Great place

Incredible food and atmosphere! Friends and I decided to check out Uproar --  truly a hidden gem in Old Town. Ambiance and environment was clean, friendly, and the vibe was pleasant. The food and drinks were even better. Opted for the burger and fries and I was impressed with the quality and taste value. Waitress did a fine job accommodating our party throughout the evening.  As point of reference, if menu items are no longer available, kindly remind your guests before ordering. For all of us, it was our first time and we thought long and hard about our choices beforehand to expedite the process due to COVID protocols. We were looking forward to a handful of items (Lobster Mac and Patty Melt). We discovered these items in particular were unavailable at the point of order therefore folks had to default to a third option. Besides that, awesome spot. Will return for sure. Thanks!

All the yes. I mean that. Uproar is FABULOUS! From the gorgeous decor to the incredibly delicious food to the super friendly and knowledgeable staff, Uproar is an absolute MUST GO TO! Every detail was carefully chosen and in every single aspect with no stone left unturned. No matter who you are, what age you are or what your tastes are, you are guaranteed to find something in the details that you can connect with and thoroughly enjoy. You can't go wrong ordering a little bit of everything and sharing. I am really looking forward to my next visit and/or order! LOVED IT!

Tonight our family dined at Uproar for the first time. From the moment we walked in, the hosts were friendly and welcoming. The staff all wore masks, took our temperature, and had the tables properly distanced. No detail was left unturned as the decor inside is top notch. The ambiance inside is eclectic, comfortable, and modern. Our specialty drinks were on point! You can never go wrong with the strawberry basil lemonade. Britt our server was beyond professional and so friendly! With it being our first time dining there, we had questions about the menu and she had the answers. We ordered a bit of everything and shared. For starters, you have to try the Sally Mac’s Bar Mix, Bread & Butter and the Gravlax Bites. So so good! The Squash soup with the house giardiniera hit the spot and was a great vegan option for us. It was obvious that the kitchen was highly experienced as the dishes that we ordered were so flavorful and the presentation was something out of a magazine. Would recommend the Roasted Chicken, French Onion French Toast, Pot Roast, and West Coast Veggrrito. There is something for everyone. The owners were present and busy walking around communicating with their staff and checking in on the tables. It was obvious they all took pride in the restaurant. We look forward to our next visit back soon!
Get the Mai Tai! Great Booze ratio!

This is the best place in Old Town, period. The front of house is super welcoming. The decor is next level (be sure to check out the floor to ceiling pink stairwell). The food, however, is the crowning jewel (thanks to  Chef Jamie Fischer). If you’re looking for IG worthy food that actually tastes AMAZING, look no further. French onion x French toast, Gravlax, Hush puppies and the Roasted Chicken are all a strong recommends that are guaranteed to create food envy on the ‘Gram!

This is started by four partners and one was a known DJ in the River North club industry. This has three floors and a small patio on the third floor. I started out with the Ceasar Salad, Hush Puppies and then the Gyro Meatloaf and fries. They don't have dessert though. The hush puppies dipping sauce stood out. Also the fries were very good. The prices are affordable. The service and staff was great.

Excellent atmosphere and very friendly staff.  The food is VERY GOOD!  We tried several dishes and each one had great flavor and diversity.  Service was quick and accurate. Drinks were also very tasty and unique. I think this place is going to be around for years to come!  Will absolutely go back and highly recommend!

Wow! The food here is fantastic but the ambience and general vibe is even more on point. I simply can’t wait for the pandemic to pass to see this place packed on a Saturday night. The energy screams for a fun night out in Old Town at this awesome new spot! Hidden gem for now...
